info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 3:40PM MST until July 25 at 4:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 340 PM MST, Heavy rain ended over Short Creek - Colorado City before 3 PM MST. Flash flooding has been minor but additional moderate rainfall will continue to produce flows in Short Creek through 430 PM MST. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Colorado City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
